name: Branching Out (conners)
description:
A short puzzle game about spreading your roots to every tile on the board! Navigate with WASD and don't get trapped

By NotSheepmaster24, Conners & Sparsleami

Asset credits;

Font https://www.1001fonts.com/lunchtime-doubly-so-font.html 

Cat sprite https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites 

Medals https://grappe.itch.io/medal

UI https://soulofkiran.itch.io/pixel-art-wooden-gui-v1 

Tile set https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-platformer-village-props 

Sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/Beetlemuse/sounds/531454/ https://freesound.org/people/theoctopus559/sounds/622894/ https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/540568/
